name: gopher-grades
description: Search and analyze UMN courses, professors, and grade distributions.
long_description: Gopher Grades MCP is a Python MCP server that enables searching and analysis of University of Minnesota courses, professors, and grade distributions. It allows LLM to find courses by department, number, level, GPA, and keywords; retrieve detailed grade statistics for courses and professors, and list courses fulfilling liberal education requirements.

tools.name: search_courses
tools.description: Search for UMN courses by department, course number, level, GPA, and descriptions. Returns course details and grade statistics.

tools.name: get_grades_of_a_course
tools.description: Get details and grades for a course.

tools.name: get_liberal_education_courses
tools.description: Get courses that fulfill a specific liberal education requirement.
